FIT. FORM. FUNCTION

Clothing for confident women who are not afraid of attention or adventure.

A letter from Michelle

At ML, we thrive on boldness, wildness, and vibrant statements.

The Hawaiian Print embodies this spirit, fusing chaos, beauty, and creativity into a captivating design.

We've taken it further, selecting a real-life sailor and adventurer as our model. Just like her, we navigate uncharted waters, forging our unique path in a traditionally male-dominated sea. It's not just about fashion; it's about the friendships and inspiration we gain on this journey.

Join us on this adventure through our NEW Hawaiian Print and immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Michelle Ludek.

Stay tuned for updates and let's ride the waves together!

Love, Michelle

FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM
Our new Saskia pants, named after an amazing member of our team, who is always so effortlessly elegant and stylish. Sitting in the waist with a constructed waistband Saskia is a combination of elegance and structure however not to be confused with dressy as I would wear them with a Rosie top, Enma top, or your favourite T you have in your cupboard with a stunning pair of Earrings to tie it all together. If you are feeling the need to dress them up add our new Reese button-down shirt and Nina Skep belt for a dramatic statement. Always pockets for hiding lipsticks or other treasures I am quite in love with them. I am obsessing over a wide-leg silhouette and these are a relaxed fit with freedom of movement. Amazing with heels or your most comfortable trainers! Let me know in the comments below which style we should do next?

19 FEBRUARY •
With love from me to you… I can’t believe it is February already. I am sure like most of you it feels as if your December break was 6 months ago! For me, it’s the pace of my life and all the hats I wear as business woman, designer, mother, wife, daughter, sister and friend (and all my other self inflicted titles!). February is traditionally the month of love...but it brings me to think about all the love I am grateful for in my life. Every day should day is a reminder of your blessings: may it be your children, family, friendships...even simple things like waking up to enjoy a cup of coffee or having a warm bed to sleep in. My life is abundant. I am blessed...to live in Cape Town (where my heart belongs!); to have both my parents still very much active and who I am very close to. I am blessed to be doing exactly what I love every day- I recognise how lucky I am to have found my passion and am still passionate about it. I appreciate all my clients who have become friends and supported me during my career, it would never have been this fun without you. 16 years ago when I took a risk and pursued my career I had no idea if what I created would be relatable to my clientele. I kept the very first sales report from The Space in Rosebank when I sold 3 skirts, 2 dresses and 2 tops in the first week. How lucky am I? Amazing clients and friends who have walk besides me on this journey called life. xoxo Michelle
